special_text:
As long as it’s your turn, Elun, Cursed with Instinct is a 4/5 Octopus creature with ward {2}.
[+1]: Up to one target creature has base power and toughness 2/2 until your next turn.
[-3]: Elun fights target creature.
[-7]: You get an emblem with “whenever a creature enters the battlefield under an opponent’s control, it fights up to one target creature of your choice.”
notes:
